name: A Quick Cure
description:
Made for the (The HEART JAM) with the Godot Engine. The theme: Scarcity

You are cursed and you have 2 minutes until you die. If you interact with the shrine,  there is a chance that the old God Trigono will appear and heal you. Collect luck to increase his appearance rate.

Controls: Play with a keyboard or a gamepad.
